name: ByteSizedBitsToBuildYourBusiness
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Whether you are new to the Direct Sales industry, a seasoned representative looking to increase your income or an entrepreneur who wants to start living the life of your dreams, you are in the right place.

With this briefing, you will learn to sell like a pro, schedule like a diva and recruit like a pop star.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
